vibe: New Year's Eve and the AI keeps on shipping

content.tldr: The HN digest system now uses JSON as source of truth. Org and HTML are derived artifacts. Translations can be added independently.
content.take: Finally, a data format that doesn't require regex wizardry to parse. The org-mode era is over, long live structured data.

comments.text: Should have been JSON from day one.

content.tldr: You can now generate historical digests for any week in 2025 using Algolia's HN search API. Just point the backfill agent at a date range.
content.take: 2025 in review, curated by AI. This is either peak productivity or peak navel-gazing. Probably both.

comments.text: Finally can see what mattered in January.
